alert.note: Alert for Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Floyd and southeastern Magoffin Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 200 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hueysville, or 10 miles southwest of Prestonsburg, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Printer, Hunter and Drift around 205 PM EDT. Martin, Arkansas, Alphoretta, Dock and Blue Moon around 210 PM EDT. Allen, Allen City, Banner, Beaver Junction, Dwale, Dana, Honaker and Aluba around 215 PM EDT. Alvin, Emma, Ivel, Corn Fork Hollow, Lancer, Justell, Betsy Layne and Harold around 220 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Endicott and Dicks Creek. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Kentucky Highway 80 in Floyd County between mile markers 1 and 14. U.S. Highway 23 in Floyd County between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
